fi.aapzu.pentago.logic

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.aapzu.pentago.logic.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements Serializable
    The board of the Pentago. Contains Tiles and Marbles.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Calls the constructor with the default values 2 as sideLength and 3 as tileSideLength.
      Board(Board other)
      Copy-constructor to clone the Board.
      Board(int sideLength, int tileSideLength)
      Creates the Board, and the Tiles in it.

      • Board

        public Board(int sideLength,
             int tileSideLength)
        Creates the Board, and the Tiles in it.
        Parameters:
        sideLength - the amount of the Tiles per side
        tileSideLength - the amount of the Marbles per side of a Tile

      • Board

        public Board()
        Calls the constructor with the default values 2 as sideLength and 3 as tileSideLength.

        Returns:

        public Marble removeMarble(int x,

        y - the Y coordinate
        Returns:
        the removed Marble
